title: Is NCERT enough for periodic table and chemical bonding for neet and AIIMS? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Yeah ,the topic that you have to study is from NCERT but the contents in that topics is not enough.Most of the concepts are not given which are asked in neet or aiims .All you have to do is to grasp concepts so ,it would be better if you refer to some module or some other textbooks or class notes(if you take coaching classes) or some youtube videos. Cheers .
